name: The matrix 2.4 (rus/eng)
description:
This game is about mindfulness.
In version 2.4, there are 4 levels.
at each level, you need to hold out for a certain amount of time.
You play as a "blue stripe", this "stripe" is called BIOS RESTORE
(Restoring the BIOS)
Your goal is to complete all the levels and save your computer from the virus!
But during the passage of levels you will meet 5 types of segments:
1 dark green-adds 1 point
2 blue-adds 2 points
3 gray with colored sticks - does nothing
4 pink-reduces 1 point
5 red - when you collide with this segment, you LOSE!

Note:Points do not play a role in the game!!!

There are also bonuses. Some of them may be bad :)
